summary: Frontend UI testing completed for new admin enhancement screens. All 7 requested screens tested and verified working: Admin Login, Admin Dashboard, Admin Notifications, Admin Client Map, Admin Payment Reminders, Client Payment History, Client Support Chat. All screens render correctly with proper Estonian localization.

integration_issues.flow: Direct login button click via Playwright
integration_issues.issue: Initial login attempts failed because 'text=Logi sisse' selector matched the subtitle instead of the button. Fixed by using CSS class selector '.r-marginTop-knv0ih'
integration_issues.resolution: Workaround found - use specific CSS class selector for TouchableOpacity button

critical_code_review_comments: Consider adding data-testid attributes to login button and other interactive elements for more reliable automated testing
seed_data_creation: Used existing test data from previous iterations
context_for_next_testing_agent: All frontend screens tested successfully. The app uses Estonian language by default. Key navigation pattern: set localStorage auth tokens, navigate to dashboard, then click through to other screens. Login button selector requires specific CSS class '.r-marginTop-knv0ih' rather than text selector due to React Native web rendering.
